Articles.Content: OK so I today I noticed quite a few of my command pods do not have aero/thermal re-entry effects. In my physics tab in the alt+f12 menu show that the ModuleManager physics is loaded an not physics.cfg. I can't seem to figure out how to set physics.cfg as the default. Is there a way to do it? I'm running the 64bit work around and have a ton of mods. I hope it's an easy fix and I won't have to go mod by mod to find the culprit.
